title: "Pure Storage, Nvidia unveil new AI-ready infrastructure"
excerpt: "Flash storage developer Pure Storage together with technology partner Nvidia Wednesday unveiled the next generation of their AIRI AI-ready infrastructure that combines Pure Storage’s new FlashBlade//S: array with Nvidia’s DGX GPU and promised to update that infrastructure to more advanced Nvidia GPUs as they become available."
